title: PV ARRAY EARTH CONDUCTOR INSTALLATION
fullText:
Earth conductors should be in close proximity to the positive and negative conductors PV array and sub array cables. Where power conversion equipment is used, the earth conductor shall pass in close proximity to the PCE and then follow the output conductors of the PCE, where possible, to avoid electrical interference generated by the PCE propagating to other parts of the system.

Earthing conductor installation shall conform with the requirements specified in AS/NZS 3000.

Where an earth is required for the PCE, it should be connected to the electrical installation earthing system, refer to AS/NZS 3000.
